answerText: generator[10] This device uses an insulating belt to build up large amounts of positive charge on the surface of a metal sphere. Its ability to produce very large voltage differences makes it useful in particle accelerators.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 2 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name the following devices that are involved in creation of electricity for 10 points each: [10] This device converts mechanical energy to electrical energy. Contrasted with motors, a simple example is a dynamo, which uses an armature and a commutator to create DC current.
